channel.title: Comments on: The Jewish Forum
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: AS
item.dc:creator: AS
item.description: On the flip side Kaplan had an important influence on at a cadre of JTS rabbis who were not followers of Heschel or Finkelstein. So he not only was the impetus for Orthodoxy to pull away from the fuzzy middle that had been holding, but for a chunk of Conservatism to do the same when those rabbis took pulpits.
item.content:encoded: On the flip side Kaplan had an important influence on at a cadre of JTS rabbis who were not followers of Heschel or Finkelstein. So he not only was the impetus for Orthodoxy to pull away from the fuzzy middle that had been holding, but for a chunk of Conservatism to do the same when those rabbis took pulpits.
